channel.title: How do i change a price of a item in a shop?

i know where it is, item.cfg, it is the second one u ahve to edit but just dont remeber wat to devid it by it is somthing 126.68 or somthing an du devid it by wat u want the price to be then enter that numer in there i know the number is 126. somthing :X
